flawed_nl_solution:
His speed means he can do 10/100=<<10/100=0.1>>0.1 minute per piece
So he can finish 1 puzzle in 2000*0.1=<<2000*0.1=2000>>2000 minutes
So these two puzzles take 2000*2=<<2000*2=4000>>4000 minutes
#### 4000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 2000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
